title: PBE Please?
body: What does it take to get a PBE account? I play daily and I am never toxic but its been 3-4 months since I signed up, or does it take this long to get one? I'm just curious.

replies.body:
There's no expected timeline or wait time to get into the PBE. The criteria with which we select testers changes quite often, depending on what we're testing at the moment that we send out a batch of invites. For example, if we were looking at testing a new champ that's really tanky, we may send out invites to players who main Taric or Leona.

____

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more information regarding the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
